caption: The image is an advertisement for a national burger day promotion. The ad features a close-up of a delicious hamburger with lettuce and tomato, accompanied by the text "enjoy a buy one get one promo at ofline store." The ad also includes a call to action, asking "are you ready?" and encouraging customers to celebrate national burger day.
original_title: orange gradient shape modern burger day instagram post
texts:
enjoy a buy one
get one promo at ofline store
